about_the_game:
PESTICIDE

Another day, another cockroach to squash. Welcome to the city Mr.E !

Brace yourself for a slay-fest through filthy districts of a desolate cockroach infested town.
Roaches rule the streets but not for very long - bugs deserve no mercy ! ! !

Chop them down like a karate master, boil them with acid gun, crack them open with pipes, bats and other useful things, snap, split, tear...hell, use shotguns if you need to but get the job done and get it done fast. clean ' n ' clear !!!

Deadly dust is all you leave behind !

As an elite bug hunter your speed is your primal instinct. Think fast, combo your super speed with wide arsenal of unique bullet-spewing tools and bitch-slap those pesky roaches straight to oblivion.



Show your gentle side

These bugs fear cats more than you, but even cats sometimes need to be rescued. Katty's voice is always calling for your aid and you would be wise to answer it. Who knows, you might get lucky.

Navigate, Evade-icate, Destroy-icate

In a town that needs a hero your presence is pretty much legendary. Pay close attention to those tricky corners, roaches love dark and concealed areas and they don't play fair. Kill them on sight and boast to Katty later. Time crunches hard, be fast or fail faster.

Collect – React

Spoils of hunt are yours for keeping but not before you find them. Unique trinkets await you in this infested town and memories are worth more then some might think...( or was it photos? )







NO - MTX
All character cosmetics - FREE, available in game
all updates - FREE

content_descriptors.notes:
Stylized non-realistic blood / yellow-green. 
Explicit nude photos of female character Pussy Katty that ar hidden in level and function and collectables.
Violance with melee weapons like baseball bats and with firearms.

detailed_description:
PESTICIDE

Another day, another cockroach to squash. Welcome to the city Mr.E !

Brace yourself for a slay-fest through filthy districts of a desolate cockroach infested town.
Roaches rule the streets but not for very long - bugs deserve no mercy ! ! !

Chop them down like a karate master, boil them with acid gun, crack them open with pipes, bats and other useful things, snap, split, tear...hell, use shotguns if you need to but get the job done and get it done fast. clean ' n ' clear !!!

Deadly dust is all you leave behind !

As an elite bug hunter your speed is your primal instinct. Think fast, combo your super speed with wide arsenal of unique bullet-spewing tools and bitch-slap those pesky roaches straight to oblivion.



Show your gentle side

These bugs fear cats more than you, but even cats sometimes need to be rescued. Katty's voice is always calling for your aid and you would be wise to answer it. Who knows, you might get lucky.

Navigate, Evade-icate, Destroy-icate

In a town that needs a hero your presence is pretty much legendary. Pay close attention to those tricky corners, roaches love dark and concealed areas and they don't play fair. Kill them on sight and boast to Katty later. Time crunches hard, be fast or fail faster.

Collect – React

Spoils of hunt are yours for keeping but not before you find them. Unique trinkets await you in this infested town and memories are worth more then some might think...( or was it photos? )







NO - MTX
All character cosmetics - FREE, available in game
all updates - FREE

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2GB) / Radeon RX 460 (2GB)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2GB) / Radeon RX 460 (2GB)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a

name: PESTICIDE Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3100 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2GB) / Radeon RX 460 (2GB)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3100 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: PESTICIDE is a raw reflex action FPS that puts a heavy emphasis on total mayhem against nasty humanoid man-eating cockroaches. Exterminate them all through the desolate and filthy city districts, collect trophies and skins, find secrets and save adult actress Pussy Katty from their clutches.
